"Adding Special Abilities":
"Weapons can be improved by attaching Special Abilities to them subjective to the type of ability that was attached.

Weapon abilities can be added at the Item Lab. Below are some examples of ability effects.

\u3000\u3000Power I = S-ATK +10
\u3000\u3000Stamina II = HP +40
\u3000\u3000Lucky Rise I = Item drop rate +5%

There are a variety of abilities other than these."

"You need the following to complete an ability:

- Meseta
- Component weapon or armor unit

You can add whatever you want from the abilities of the component item. The component item must have the same number of abilities as the base item, except when the base item has none at all, in which case the number does not matter."
"The chance of abilities being passed on depends on the quantity and success rate. Try to create a special item that is all your own."
